rows.label: bf08080100_0010
rows.name:
Oh really...
So you lost Tora and the others?

rows.label: bf08080100_0020
rows.name:
It's fine!
Masterpon is not as soft as he look!

rows.label: bf08080100_0030
rows.name:
It's faint, but I can feel the energy signature of Meleph's
weapons. She must be here too...

rows.label: bf08080100_0040
rows.name: OK! Let's rest up, then go look for them.

rows.label: bf08080100_0050
rows.name:
Hey, Rex.
What about that man there?

rows.label: bf08080100_0060
rows.name:
Ah...
I think I beat him up pretty bad in that fight.

rows.label: bf08080100_0070
rows.name: I couldn't just leave him to die.

rows.label: bf08080100_0080
rows.name: I thought it'd be something like that...

rows.label: bf08080100_0090
rows.name: Ah... Your sweet, bleeding heart!

rows.label: bf08080100_0100
rows.name: So. What are we going to do?

rows.label: bf08080100_0110
rows.name: Uh...

rows.label: bf08080100_0120
rows.name: Hikari, maybe you could, uh...

rows.label: bf08080100_0130
rows.name:
Fine! Whatever!
Gimme a sec...

rows.label: bf08080100_0140
rows.name:
Incredible!
What awesome power you've acquired!

rows.label: bf08080100_0150
rows.name: This is the power of the Master Blade!

rows.label: bf08080100_0160
rows.name:
The Master Blade possesses the data
of all Blade cores.

rows.label: bf08080100_0180
rows.name: This is...?!

rows.label: bf08080100_0190
rows.name: What's wrong?

rows.label: bf08080100_0200
rows.name: His heart...is of a human.

rows.label: bf08080100_0210
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Uh?

rows.label: bf08080100_0220
rows.name: He's...

rows.label: bf08080100_0230
rows.name: ...a Flesh Eater!
